nodes.description: white book with subtle yellow accents and a bookmark

graphs.instruction: Bring the book from the living room to the bedroom and place it on the chest of drawers. The book is white with subtle yellow accents and a bookmark. This book was a gift from my friend.

nodes.description: black cup with a smooth surface

graphs.instruction: Move the jug and cup from the kitchen counter to the dining table. Place them next to each other on the table. The jug is cream-colored with a curved handle, and the cup is black with a smooth surface. The cup is part of my favorite dinnerware.

nodes.description: gradient teal candle with a white top

graphs.instruction: Change the positions of the vase, candle, and bowl to a different table in the living room. The vase is teal with a tall, slender neck, the candle is a gradient teal with a white top, and the bowl is brown wooden with a smooth finish. The candle was a gift from my friend.

nodes.description: white vase with a rounded body and narrow neck

graphs.instruction: Put the candle holder, statue, and vase back on the table in the bedroom. The candle holder is white and tan with a rounded base, the statue is beige on a black base, and the vase is white with a rounded body and narrow neck. The vase was a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: light pink cup with Pantone 337 C marking

graphs.instruction: Help me prepare for lunch by moving the jug and cup from the kitchen counter to the dining table. Place them next to each other. The jug is light green with a curved spout, and the cup is light pink with Pantone 337 C marking. The cup is a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: green toy train with red and black details, called Thomas Friends Wooden Railway Henry

graphs.instruction: First, move the toy vehicle from the bedroom to the living room. Then, place it on the couch in the living room. The toy vehicle is a green toy train with red and black details, called Thomas Friends Wooden Railway Henry. This toy train was my favorite childhood toy.

nodes.description: glossy gray vase with an elongated neck
stuffed toy, yellow giraffe with a red bag

graphs.instruction: Help me tidy up the living room. First, move the vase and stuffed toy from the table to the couch. Place them next to each other. The vase is glossy gray with an elongated neck, and the stuffed toy is a yellow giraffe with a red bag. The vase is from my travel abroad.

nodes.alias: gift stuffed toy bear from friend
nodes.description: gray bear with a paw print on its scarf
colorful assortment of electric pots

graphs.instruction: Move the plant container from the bedroom table to the living room table. Take the stuffed toy from the kitchen cabinet and put it on a bedroom table. The plant container is a colorful assortment of electric pots by Cole Hardware, and the stuffed toy is a gray bear with a paw print on its scarf. The stuffed toy bear is a gift from my friend.

nodes.description: white pen with black accents

graphs.instruction: First, move the pen from the living room table to the shelves. Then, place it on the floor next to the bed in the bedroom. The pen is white with black accents. It's my lucky pen.

nodes.description: beige book titled 'UNIX' with a simple cover design

graphs.instruction: Move the book and candle from the living room couch to the dining table. Place them next to each other on the table. The book is beige titled 'UNIX' with a simple cover design, and the candle is white on a black holder. The book is a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: keep jug and cup together on the dining table for easy access during lunch

nodes.name: dining_table
nodes.expression: on the dining table in the dining room

graphs.instruction: Help me prepare for lunch by moving the jug and cup from the kitchen counter to the dining table. Place them next to each other. I prefer having the jug and cup together on the dining table for easy access during lunch.

nodes.description: keep plates and bowls next to each other in the cabinet for easy access when setting the table

graphs.instruction: Put the plate and bowl together in another cabinet in the kitchen and place them next to each other. I prefer to keep my plates and bowls next to each other in the cabinet for easy access when setting the table.

nodes.description: keep vase and stuffed toy next to each other on the couch during cleaning for easy access later

nodes.name: couch
nodes.expression: on the couch in the living room

graphs.instruction: Help me tidy up the living room. First, move the vase and stuffed toy from the table to the couch. Place them next to each other. I like to have the vase and stuffed toy together on the couch during cleaning for easy access later.

nodes.description: keep toy vehicle on the living room couch so it's easy to find when playing

nodes.name: couch
nodes.expression: on the couch in the living room

graphs.instruction: First, move the toy vehicle from the bedroom to the living room. Then, place it on the couch in the living room. I often keep the toy vehicle on the living room couch so it's easy to find when I want to play with it.

nodes.description: move plant container to living room for better sunlight and place stuffed toy on bedroom table for a cozy touch

graphs.instruction: Move the plant container from the bedroom table to the living room table. Take the stuffed toy from the kitchen cabinet and put it on a bedroom table. I like to have the plant container in the living room for better sunlight, and the stuffed toy should be on the bedroom table to add a cozy touch.

nodes.description: square white plate with a black geometric pattern and a white bowl with a brown lid

graphs.instruction: Put the plate and bowl together in another cabinet in the kitchen and place them next to each other. The plate is a square white plate with a black geometric pattern, and the bowl is a white bowl with a brown lid. The plate and bowl are part of my dinnerware set.

nodes.description: black book with gold accents

graphs.instruction: Help me tidy up the living room table. Move the clock, book, and candle to the stand? The book is black with gold accents, the candle has a brown and blue gradient, and the clock is round and white with black numbers and a brown frame. The book is a gift from my friend.

nodes.description: keep book and candle together on the dining table for a cozy reading time

graphs.instruction: Move the book and candle from the living room couch to the dining table. Place them next to each other on the table. I usually have my book and candle together on the dining table for a cozy reading time.

nodes.description: keep the clock, book, and candle on the stand for tidiness

nodes.name: stand
nodes.expression: on the stand in the living room

graphs.instruction: Help me tidy up the living room table. Move the clock, book, and candle to the stand. I usually have the clock, book, and candle on the stand for as my usual setup.

nodes.description: keep the book on the chest of drawers in the bedroom for bedtime reading

nodes.name: chest_of_drawers
nodes.expression: on the chest of drawers in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Bring the book from the living room to the bedroom and place it on the chest of drawers. I prefer to keep the book on the chest of drawers in the bedroom for my bedtime reading routine.

nodes.description: keep jug and cup next to each other on the dining table for easy access during meals

graphs.instruction: Move the jug and cup from the kitchen counter to the dining table. Place them next to each other on the table. I like to have the jug and cup next to each other on the dining table for easy access during meals.

nodes.description: prefer to have the candle holder, statue, and vase arranged on the bedroom table for a calming atmosphere

nodes.name: bedroom_table
nodes.expression: on the table in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Put the candle holder, statue, and vase back on the table in the bedroom. I prefer to have the candle holder, statue, and vase arranged on the bedroom table for a calming atmosphere.

nodes.description: rearrange vase, candle, and bowl to keep the living room setting fresh and inviting

nodes.name: livingroom_table
nodes.expression: different table in the living room

graphs.instruction: Change the positions of the vase, candle, and bowl to a different table in the living room. I like to rearrange these items to keep the living room setting fresh and inviting.

nodes.description: keep lamp and jug together on the kitchen counter for late-night snacks

graphs.instruction: First, move the lamp from the table in the bedroom to the counter in the kitchen. Next, move the jug to the counter in the kitchen and place it next to the lamp. I prefer to have the lamp and jug together on the kitchen counter for late-night snacks.
